lead_paragraph: Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal will meet in the Monte Carlo Masters final on Sunday for the third straight year. Federer advanced after Novak Djokovic retired, trailing, 6-3, 3-2. Nadal beat Nikolay Davydenko, 6-3, 6-2, reaching his fourth straight final.
